name: task::kernel_stack::KernelStack::flush_tlb

cpu::id::current::PinCurrentCpu::current.doc: Returns the ID of the current CPU.

util::id_set::AtomicIdSet::<I>::contains.doc: Atomically checks if the set contains the specified ID.

arch::mm::tlb_flush_addr_range.doc: Flush any TLB entry that intersects with the given address range.

doc: Flushes the TLB for the current CPU if necessary.
